trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The StrokeCollection enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes.
trans-unit.target: O StrokeCollection permite que você execute funções como ocorrências de teste, corte e apagar traços.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> provides, the StrokeCollection offers more options.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>controle executa muitas dessas funções, mas se você precisa de mais controle que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>fornece, StrokeCollection oferece mais opções.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista onde saber mais sobre o gerenciamento de tinta digital em um controle personalizado.

trans-unit.source: |To do this…|See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |Create a control that collects digital ink|[Creating an Ink Input Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values |Term|Definition| |----------|----------------| |`isfString`|A string that represents the stroke in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).|
trans-unit.target: | Para fazer isso... | Consulte este artigo | |-----------------|----------------------| | Criar um controle que coleta tinta digital | [Controle de entrada criar uma tinta](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Criar um controle que permite que o usuário selecione tinta | [Como: selecionar Ink em um controle personalizado](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Criar um controle que permite que o usuário apagar ponto tinta | [Como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) | # # uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # uso do elemento de objeto XAML ``` ``` # # valores XAML | Termo | Definição | |----------|----------------| | `isfString`| Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o traço na base&64; codificados Ink serializado Format (ISF). |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> class that contains the specified strokes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> classe que contém os traços especificados.

trans-unit.source: The strokes to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os traços para adicionar ao <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> of Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
trans-unit.target: Inicializa um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> especificado <xref:System.IO.Stream>de tinta serializado Format (ISF).</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream that contains ink data.
trans-unit.target: Um fluxo que contém dados de tinta.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified strokes to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona os traços especificados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Add method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O método Add gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: A in strokes is already a member of the .
trans-unit.target: A in strokes is already a member of the .

trans-unit.source: strokes is .
trans-unit.target: strokesis .

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma propriedade personalizada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AddPropertyData method enables you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O método AddPropertyData permite adicionar propriedades personalizadas para <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, você pode incluir informações adicionais com <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to associate with the custom property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>para associar a propriedade personalizada.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade personalizada.

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types, except <xref:System.String>, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`deve ser do tipo <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>ou uma matriz desses tipos de dados, exceto <xref:System.String>, que não é permitido.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is an empty .
trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdestá vazio .

trans-unit.source: -or- propertyData is not one of the allowed data types listed in the section.
trans-unit.target: - ou - propertyData não é um dos tipos de dados permitidos listados no seção.

trans-unit.source: Clears all strokes from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Limpa todos os traços do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that are outside the bounds of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os traços de <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> que estão fora dos limites do <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> matriz.

trans-unit.source: The Clip method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: O método Clip conecta-se o primeiro e último pontos no `lassoPoints` para criar o laço.

trans-unit.source: The Clip method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it clips.
trans-unit.target: O método Recortar gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>-recorta.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que especificam a área recortada.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not extend beyond the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Substitui todos os traços que estão cortados pelo retângulo especificado com novos traçados que não se estendem além do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely outside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: Todos os traços que estão totalmente fora do retângulo especificado são removidos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que especificam a área recortada.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method copies each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in the collection and the new <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> references the new strokes.
trans-unit.target: O método Clone copia cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>na coleção e o novo <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>faz referência os novos traçados.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the specified custom property identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se o identificador de propriedade personalizada especificada está no <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>para localizar no <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified custom property identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o identificador de propriedade personalizada especificada está no <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha os traços <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> on which to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> na qual desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the ink that is within the bounds of the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Remove a tinta que esteja dentro dos limites da área especificada.

trans-unit.source: The Erase method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: O método apagar conecta-se o primeiro e último pontos no `lassoPoints` para criar o laço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>podem conter traços de novo depois que o método de exclusão é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a área especificada estiver no meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, o método apagar remove que <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>e cria dois novos traçados.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: O método apagar gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>-apaga.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que especificam a área a ser apagados.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not enter the bounds of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Substitui todos os traços que estão cortados pelo retângulo especificado com novos traçados que não insira os limites do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>podem conter traços de novo depois que o método de exclusão é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a área especificada estiver no meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, o método apagar remove que <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>e cria dois novos traçados.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely inside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: Todos os traços que estão completamente dentro do retângulo especificado são removidos.

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: O método apagar gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>-apaga.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que especificam a área a ser apagados.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the region created by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> along the specified path with new Strokes that are not clipped by the region.
trans-unit.target: Substitui todos os traços que estão cortados pela região criado pelo especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> ao longo do caminho especificado com novos traçados que não são cortados por região.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>podem conter traços de novo depois que o método de exclusão é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `path` intersects the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `path` intercepta o meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, o método apagar remove que <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>e cria dois novos traçados.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: O método apagar gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>-apaga.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the path to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> que especifica o caminho a ser apagados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the shape of the eraser.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> que especifica a forma de borracha.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the strokes in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites dos traços na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The GetBounds method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> that takes the appearance of the rendered <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O método GetBounds retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Rect>que usa a aparência de renderizado <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Rect>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is 10 display independent pixels (DIP) wide, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect> includes the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>for 10 exibição pixels independentes (DIP) grande, o que <xref:System.Windows.Rect>inclui toda a largura de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Rect> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that contains the bounds of the strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que contém os limites de traços de <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> with a lasso (freehand) path.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"> </xref> que testes de clique a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> com um caminho de Laço (à mão livre).

trans-unit.source: The GetIncrementalLassoHitTester method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: O método GetIncrementalLassoHitTester retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>que considera um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>seja "atingido" quando o caminho de Laço envolve proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to select a stroke with a lasso tool.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para implementar recursos, como a capacidade de selecionar um traço com a ferramenta de Laço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> to implement the lasso selection tool.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>usa um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>para implementar a ferramenta de seleção de Laço.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The minimum percentage of each <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that must be contained within the lasso for it to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: A porcentagem mínima de cada <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> que deve estar contido na Laço para ser considerado ocorrências.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"> </xref> que testes de clique a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> with an erasing path.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"> </xref> que testes de clique a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> com um caminho de apagar.

trans-unit.source: The GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: O método GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>que considera um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>seja "atingido" quando o caminho de borracha intercepta proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to erase part of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para implementar recursos, como a capacidade de apagar parte de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>usa um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the tip of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> que especifica a dica da caneta.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"> </xref> que testes de clique a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the custom property associated with the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor da propriedade personalizada associada a <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid> especificado

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> and GetPropertyData methods enable you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A>e GetPropertyData métodos permitem adicionar propriedades personalizadas para <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, você pode incluir informações adicionais com <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the custom property to get.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>associado com a propriedade personalizada para obter.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de traços que tenham pelo menos a porcentagem especificada de comprimento dentro do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The minimum required length of a Stroke that must exist within bounds for it to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento mínimo necessário de um traço que deve existir dentro dos limites para ser considerado ocorrências.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns -1 if `stroke` is not a member of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O método IndexOf retornará -1 se `stroke` não é um membro de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The stroke whose position is required.
trans-unit.target: O traço cuja posição é necessária.

trans-unit.source: The index of the stroke.
trans-unit.target: O índice do traço.

trans-unit.source: Represents the native persistence format for ink data.
trans-unit.target: Representa o formato de persistência nativo para dados de tinta.

trans-unit.source: Use the InkSerializedFormat field to specify the format of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> when you transfer data, such as when you copy the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Use o campo de InkSerializedFormat para especificar o formato da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>ao transferir dados, como quando você copia o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>na área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Insere um traço no <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.target: O índice especificado.

trans-unit.target: O traço especificado

trans-unit.target: Dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: The OnStrokesChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: O método OnStrokesChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um delegado, que é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade personalizada é adicionada ou removida o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified strokes from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove os traços especificados da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to compress the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para compactar o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the stroke at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o traço no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to replace the stroke.
trans-unit.target: A posição na qual o traçado.

trans-unit.source: The stroke to replace the current stroke.
trans-unit.target: O traço para substituir o traço atual.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> in the collection changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> da coleção for alterada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Modifies each of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> and optionally the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform*> for each stroke in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> according to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Modifica cada o <> </> *> e, opcionalmente, o <> </> *> para cada traço o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> conforme especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the Transform method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes.
trans-unit.target: Quando `applyToStylusTip` é `true`, o método de transformação afeta a forma da dica de caneta, bem como a posição dos traços.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você gira um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>90 graus, mover os traços em torno de um eixo e a altura e largura dos traços parecem ser invertida.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> which specifies the transformation to perform on the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> que especifica a transformação para executar no <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para aplicar a transformação para a dica de caneta; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
